mapper.sql: salgrade.DEPTNO as salgrade_DEPTNO, salgrade.DNAME as salgrade_DNAME, salgrade.LOC as salgrade_LOC
mapper.insert:
insert into dept
DEPTNO,
DNAME,
LOC,
#{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dept
DNAME = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOC = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DEPTNO = #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
